invites.inviteDescription: Share your unique referral link with friends and family. When they sign up using your link, you both get rewarded! Your referrals earn extra commission, and you level up with exciting bonuses. Let's grow together!

manageWalletPage.noWalletAddressText: You haven't set your wallet address yet. Please update it below:
manageWalletPage.additionalInfoText1: Additional information about managing your wallet address can go here.
manageWalletPage.additionalInfoText2: For security purposes, make sure to keep your wallet address confidential.
manageWalletPage.snack3: You can only update your delivery address once every 24 hours.

notifPage.transactionapproved: Your transaction of {{amount}} has been approved.
notifPage.transactiondenied: Your transaction of {{amount}} has been denied.
notifPage.withdrawalapproved: Your withdrawal of {{amount}} has been approved.
notifPage.withdrawaldenied: Your withdrawal request has been denied. Please check the details and try again.

TeamPage.alert: Teams isn't available for your account type.
TeamPage.fineprnt1: T1: Team Earnings: Remember, tasks tackled by the team also contribute to individual growth. Together, as a unit, you achieve more.
TeamPage.fineprnt2: 2: Sharing Tasks: When a team task is obtained, it's crucial to collaborate efficiently to ensure swift completion and avoid potential setbacks.

GrabComp.text1: 1: How You Earn: Each task comes with its own commission, determined by the task's value and your account status. Higher tier accounts have access to greater earning opportunities.
GrabComp.text2: 2: The system sends tasks randomly. Complete them as soon as possible after matching them, so as to avoid hanging all the time.
GrabComp.text3: Heads-Up: Every time you obtain a task, its details are shared with the merchant. Orders left unresolved for over an hour get put on a temporary freeze, along with the task's associated funds, until further clarification.
GrabComp.insufficientBalance: Insufficient balance to grab a task. Please recharge a minimum of 20USD.
GrabComp.pendingTask: You have an existing pending task. Please complete it before grabbing a new one.
GrabComp.noTasksLeft: You have reached your daily limit for orders, Please upgrade for more daily tasks.

RechargeComp.HelperText: Enter or select the desired recharge amount.

WithdrawComp.InsufficientBalanceError: Insufficient balance. Please enter a valid withdrawal amount.
WithdrawComp.InfoText1: Please allow up to 3 business days for processing the withdrawal request.
WithdrawComp.InfoText2: For any inquiries or issues, please contact our support team.
WithdrawComp.TasksNotCompleted: You must finish all available tasks for today before withdrawing.
WithdrawComp.FinePrint: * Your withdrawal request will be processed within 3 business days. Any charges or fees that may apply are subject to the terms and conditions of the withdrawal policy. Always ensure the withdrawal address is correct to avoid delays.
WithdrawComp.ErrorMakingWithdrawal: An error occurred while processing your request. Please try again.

Snackbar.InsufficientFunds: Insufficient funds. Please check your balance and try again.
Snackbar.InvalidAmount: Invalid withdrawal amount. Please enter a valid amount.

PaymentPage.Notice: Note: Please ensure to upload a clear screenshot of the successful payment transaction. Failure to do so may result in the inability to credit the recharge amount to your account. The platform will not be held responsible for the loss of funds due to the unavailability of payment confirmation.
PaymentPage.text1: Ensure your payment details are correct before proceeding to avoid any delays or issues in recharging your wallet.
PaymentPage.text2: For security purposes, all transactions are encrypted. Please keep your payment information confidential to protect against unauthorized access.
PaymentPage.text3: If you encounter any issues during the payment process or need assistance, please contact our customer support. We are here to assist you 24/7.
PaymentPage.snack2error: failed. Please try again. Or contact support

TaskComp.additionalDepositRequired: You need to deposit an additional ${{deposit}} to complete this task.

register.text2: Let's start something exciting. Create your account now.
